title: Citizen
plot: Antony assumes several identities and kidnaps three government officials in order to succeed in his secret mission. However, a CBI officer sets out to find the real identity of the kidnapper.

_Citizen_ (qv) (Ajith), has many identities, as Anthony, Abdullah and Arivanandham. He has kidnapped three senior government officials and left clues as to why, which is tracked by the police. A conspiracy is uncovered and it is discovered that many years before an entire village had been wiped off the map of India...::A.C.M.

Three prominent members of society, a judge, a police official and a district collector are kidnapped in broad daylight by a man who calls himself '_Citizen_ (qv)'. As CBI Officer Sarojini (Nagma) follows his trail she finds clues to a shocking mystery, of a village called Attipatthi which simply disappeared off the map of India, and to which each of these men is connected.::Andrea
